paper_abstract: Cryptanalytic time memory trade-off is a probabilistic algorithm for inverting a generic one-way function. Since its first introduction by Hellman, many variants and their analysis results have appeared. We present a new estimate for the success probability of the original Hellman trade-off, that is more accurate than the lower bound that is widely being used today. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Success probability of the Hellman trade-off
